description: This API call updates the landing zone. It starts an asynchronous operation that updates the landing zone based on the new landing zone version, or on the changed parameters specified in the updated manifest file.

parameters.name: landingZoneIdentifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the landing zone.

parameters.name: manifest
parameters.description: The manifest file (JSON) is a text file that describes your Amazon Web Services resources. For an example, review Launch your landing zone. The example manifest file contains each of the available parameters. The schema for the landing zone's JSON manifest file is not published, by design.

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: The landing zone version, for example, 3.2.

nested_items.name: operationIdentifier
nested_items.description: A unique identifier assigned to a UpdateLandingZone operation. You can use this identifier as an input of GetLandingZoneOperation to check the operation's status.
